name: part_002
file: tmp_【#天音かなた卒業ライブ】「絶対的アイドル」 ⧸ Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE ＂THE ABSOLUTE IDOL＂【hololive】 [8iGGL_0CEpc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs 'Peace Sign' by Kenshi Yonezu during her graduation live.
Amane Kanata performs 'That's Why I Gave Up on Music' by n-buna.
scenes.song_name: That's Why I Gave Up on Music

subtitles.original: Oh oh oh oh oh oh...
subtitles.english: Oh oh oh oh oh oh...

subtitles.original:
ピースサイン
作詞・作曲：米津玄師
subtitles.english:
Peace Sign
Lyrics & Composition: Kenshi Yonezu

subtitles.original: いつか僕らの上をすれすれに通り過ぎて行ったあの飛行機を
subtitles.english:
I remember that airplane that once passed
right above our heads

subtitles.original: 不思議なくらいに覚えてる　意味もないのに何故か
subtitles.english:
It's strange how I remember it,
even though there's no reason why

subtitles.original: 不甲斐なくて泣いた日の夜に　ただ強くなりたいと願ってた
subtitles.english:
On the night I cried from feeling pathetic,
I only wished to become stronger

subtitles.original: そのために必要な勇気を　探し求めていた
subtitles.english:
I was searching for the courage
I needed to do that

subtitles.original: 残酷な運命が定まってるとして
subtitles.english: Even if a cruel fate is already decided

subtitles.original: それがいつの日か僕の前に現れるとして
subtitles.english: And if it were to appear before me someday

subtitles.original: ただ一瞬、この一瞬、息ができないなら
subtitles.english:
If for just an instant, this instant,
I can't even breathe

subtitles.original: どうでもいいと思えた　その心を
subtitles.english:
Then I won't care about anything else,
and that heart...

subtitles.original: もう一度　遠くへ行け　遠くへ行け
subtitles.english: Go further once more, go further!

subtitles.original: 僕の中で誰かが歌う　どうしようもないほど熱烈に
subtitles.english:
Someone is singing inside of me
with an uncontrollable passion

subtitles.original: いつだって目を腫らした君が　二度と悲しまないように笑える
subtitles.english:
So that you, who always has swollen eyes,
can smile and never be sad again

subtitles.original: そんなヒーローになるための歌
subtitles.english: This is a song to become that kind of hero

subtitles.original: さらば掲げろ　ピースサイン
subtitles.english: So, farewell, hold up a peace sign

subtitles.original: 転がっていくストーリーを
subtitles.english: To this story as it rolls along

subtitles.original: 守りたいだなんて言えるほど　君が弱くはないの分かってた
subtitles.english:
I knew you weren't weak enough
for me to say I wanted to protect you

subtitles.original: それ以上に僕は弱くてさ　君が大事だったんだ
subtitles.english:
But I was even weaker than that,
and you were important to me

subtitles.original: 独りで生きてくんだなんてさ　口を突いて叫んだあの日から
subtitles.english:
Since the day I blurted out
that I would live on my own

subtitles.original: 変わっていく僕を笑えばいい　独りが怖い僕を
subtitles.english:
You can laugh at how I've changed,
at how I'm afraid of being alone

subtitles.original: 蹴飛ばして噛み付いて息もできなくて
subtitles.english: Kicking, biting, and unable to breathe

subtitles.original: 騒ぐ頭とお腹の奥がぐしゃぐしゃになったって
subtitles.english:
Even if my racing head
and the pit of my stomach become a mess

subtitles.original: てらいも外聞も消えてしまうくらいに
subtitles.english:
To the point where bashfulness
and reputation both disappear

subtitles.original: 今は触っていたいんだ　君の心に
subtitles.english: Right now, I want to be touching your heart

subtitles.original: 僕たちはきっといつか遠く離れた
subtitles.english: We will surely reach out someday

subtitles.original: 太陽にすら手が届いて　夜明け前を手に入れて笑おう
subtitles.english:
Even to the distant sun,
and let's laugh as we seize the dawn

subtitles.original: そうやって青く燃える色に染まり　おぼろげな街の向こうへ
subtitles.english:
Stained in a blue burning color,
beyond the hazy city

subtitles.original: 手を繋いで走っていけるはずだ
subtitles.english: We should be able to run, holding hands

subtitles.original: 君と未来を盗み描く　捻りのないストーリーを
subtitles.english:
Stealing a glimpse of the future with you,
a story with no twists

subtitles.original: 瘡蓋だらけ荒れくれた日々が　削り削られ擦り切れた今が
subtitles.english:
Days full of scabs and roughness,
a present that's been chipped and worn away

subtitles.original: 君の言葉で蘇る　鮮やかにも現れていく
subtitles.english:
They're revived by your words,
appearing vividly before me

subtitles.original: 蛹のままで眠る魂を　食べかけのまま捨てたあの夢を
subtitles.english:
The soul sleeping in its cocoon,
the dream I threw away half-eaten

subtitles.original: もう一度取り戻せ
subtitles.english: Take them back once more!

subtitles.original: Oh oh oh oh oh oh...
subtitles.english: Oh oh oh oh oh oh...

subtitles.original: もう一度　遠くへ行け　遠くへ行け
subtitles.english: Go further once more, go further!

subtitles.original: 僕の中で誰かが歌う　どうしようもないほど熱烈に
subtitles.english:
Someone is singing inside of me
with an uncontrollable passion

subtitles.original: いつだって目を腫らした君が　二度と悲しまないように笑える
subtitles.english:
So that you, who always has swollen eyes,
can smile and never be sad again

subtitles.original: そんなヒーローになるための歌
subtitles.english: This is a song to become that kind of hero

subtitles.original: さらば掲げろ　ピースサイン
subtitles.english: So, farewell, hold up a peace sign

subtitles.original: 転がっていくストーリーを
subtitles.english: To this story as it rolls along

subtitles.original: 君と未来を盗み描く　捻りのないストーリーを
subtitles.english:
Stealing a glimpse of the future with you,
a story with no twists

subtitles.original: 考えたってわからないし　青空の下君を待った
subtitles.english:
Thinking about it won't help me understand,
I waited for you under the blue sky

subtitles.original: 風が吹いた正午　昼下がりを抜け出す想像
subtitles.english:
At noon when the wind blew,
imagining escaping the early afternoon

subtitles.original: ねぇ、これからどうなるんだろうね　進め方教わらないんだよ
subtitles.english:
Hey, what will happen from now on?
I wasn't taught how to move forward

subtitles.original: 君の目を見た　何も言えず僕は歩いた
subtitles.english:
I looked into your eyes,
and I walked on without saying a word

subtitles.original:
だから僕は音楽を辞めた
作詞・作曲：n-buna
subtitles.english:
That's Why I Gave Up on Music
Lyrics & Composition: n-buna

subtitles.original: 考えたってわからないし　青春なんてつまらないし
subtitles.english:
Thinking about it won't help me understand,
and youth is just boring anyway

subtitles.original: 辞めたはずのピアノ　机を弾く癖が抜けない
subtitles.english:
The piano I was supposed to have quit,
I can't stop the habit of playing on my desk

subtitles.original: ねぇ、将来何してるだろうね　音楽はしてないといいな
subtitles.english:
Hey, I wonder what I'll be doing in the future?
I hope I'm not doing music

subtitles.original: 困らないでよ　心
subtitles.english: Don't be troubled, my heart

subtitles.original: 喉の奥に
subtitles.english: In the back of my throat
